theClanless:AblativeSkin.NAME: Ablative Skin
theClanless:AblativeSkin.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

theClanless:ArmorOfVitality.NAME: Armor of Vitality
theClanless:ArmorOfVitality.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Thorns. NL Next turn, lose !M! Thorns.

theClanless:Barrens.NAME: The Barrens
theClanless:Barrens.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! and discard !M!.

theClanless:BaseballBat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and refund up to !M! energy. Retain.

theClanless:BastardSword.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Retain. When retained, increase Bastard Sword's damage by !M! until played.

theClanless:BloodDoll.NAME: Blood Doll
theClanless:BloodDoll.DESCRIPTION: Every three turns you may exchange HP for [E].
theClanless:BloodDoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every three turns you may exchange HP for [E] at a better rate.

theClanless:BoxedIn.NAME: Boxed In
theClanless:BoxedIn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL This turn and next turn, gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

theClanless:Bricklaying.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust 1 card at random.

theClanless:BumsRush.NAME: Bum's Rush
theClanless:BumsRush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! basic combat cards to your draw pile.

theClanless:DaringTheDawn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Burn into your discard pile.

theClanless:DeathOfMyConscience.NAME: Death of my Conscience
theClanless:DeathOfMyConscience.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength.

theClanless:Decapitate.NAME: Decapitate
theClanless:Decapitate.DESCRIPTION: If the target monster has !M! or less HP, it loses it's head.

theClanless:Disengage.NAME: Disengage
theClanless:Disengage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce Vulnerable by !M!. NL Exhaust.
theClanless:Disengage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce Vulnerable and Weak by !M!. NL Exhaust.

theClanless:Disarm.NAME: Disarm
theClanless:Disarm.DESCRIPTION: Reduce target's strength by !M!. Increase by 1 each attack played. Target recovers half of the lost strength.
theClanless:Disarm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce target's strength by !M!. Increase by 1 each attack played. Target recovers half of the lost strength.

theClanless:Distraction.NAME: Distraction
theClanless:Distraction.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until you have !M! in your hand.

theClanless:Earthshock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

theClanless:FistsOfDeath.NAME: Fists of Death
theClanless:FistsOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Strength.

theClanless:FlurryOfAction.NAME: Flurry of Action
theClanless:FlurryOfAction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [G].

theClanless:Fleetness.NAME: Fleetness
theClanless:Fleetness.DESCRIPTION: When you play an Attack, gain !M! theclanless:Maneuver.

theClanless:ForcedVigilance.NAME: Forced Vigilance
theClanless:ForcedVigilance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
theClanless:ForcedVigilance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

theClanless:ForceOfWill.NAME: Force of Will
theClanless:ForceOfWill.DESCRIPTION: You cannot draw additional cards this turn. Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0 this turn.

theClanless:ForgersHammer.NAME: Forger's Hammer
theClanless:ForgersHammer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Upgrade a card in your hand for the remainder of combat.
theClanless:ForgersHammer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Upgrade all cards in your hand for the remainder of combat.

theClanless:FracturedArmament.NAME: Fractured Armament
theClanless:FracturedArmament.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

theClanless:FreakDrive.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.
theClanless:FreakDrive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.

theClanless:GiantsBlood.NAME: Giant's Blood
theClanless:GiantsBlood.DESCRIPTION: Gain temporary hp equal to your missing HP (includes current temporary hp).

theClanless:GrowingFury.NAME: Growing Fury
theClanless:GrowingFury.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

theClanless:Haymaker.NAME: Haymaker
theClanless:Haymaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! vulnerable. NL Exhaust.
theClanless:Haymaker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

theClanless:Indomitability.NAME: Indomitability
theClanless:Indomitability.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

theClanless:InfernalPursuit.NAME: Infernal Pursuit
theClanless:InfernalPursuit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

theClanless:ImmortalGrapple.NAME: Immortal Grapple

theClanless:OrgyOfBlood.NAME: Orgy of Blood
theClanless:OrgyOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card from your hand. NL Heal !M! a number of times equal to its cost.

theClanless:Precision.NAME: Precision
theClanless:Precision.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL It costs 0 until played.

theClanless:PreternaturalEvasion.NAME: Preternatural Evasion
theClanless:PreternaturalEvasion.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 Block.
theClanless:PreternaturalEvasion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card, gain 1 Block.

theClanless:Psyche.NAME: Psyche!
theClanless:Psyche.DESCRIPTION: Take another turn after this one. NL End your turn. NL Exhaust.

theClanless:PulledFangs.NAME: Pulled Fangs
theClanless:PulledFangs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! weakness. If your last card played was an attack gain [E].

theClanless:RelentlessPursuit.NAME: Relentless Pursuit

theClanless:SanguinaryWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Skills are played twice.

theClanless:Scrounging.NAME: Scrounging

theClanless:SkinOfSteel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next !M! times you would lose HP.

theClanless:Slam.NAME: Slam
theClanless:Slam.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your block.

theClanless:Soak.NAME: Soak

theClanless:Steadfastness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain your hand this turn.

theClanless:UnflinchingPersistence.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E].

theClanless:WakeWithEveningsFreshness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. If target monster intends to attack gain !M! dexterity.
theClanless:WakeWithEveningsFreshness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. If target monster intends to attack gain !M! dexterity.
